basics.name: Neetu Roy Chanamthabam
basics.title: Senior IT Project Manager and Lead
basics.summary: Senior IT Project Manager and Lead with 14 years delivering banking/FinServ transformations. Expertise in Agile, DevOps, and hybrid Waterfall delivery across multiple streams with 50+ stakeholders. AI-enabled using ChatGPT and Gemini to accelerate planning, risk management, and decision-making. International exposure (India, US) with strong budgeting, scheduling, and governance.

experience.title: Assistant Vice President - Project Manager / Delivery Lead
experience.company: Barclays Global Service Center, Pune, India
highlights: Scope, governance & cost savings: defined program scope and delivery strategy; targeted cost savings via automation and streamlined processes.
Delivery efficiency: managed ETL workloads and cross-stream communications; allocated resources to hit milestone targets within budget.
AI-driven delivery: leveraged AI for risk assessment and test optimisation; reduced rework and testing cycles.
Stakeholder integration: coordinated 20-30 downstream integrations and data flows across multiple teams.

experience.title: Technical Project Manager / Scrum Master
highlights: Stakeholder engagement: led client workshops, SOW planning; weekly progress dashboards for milestones.
Release & continuous improvement: orchestrated releases, removed impediments, and drove process improvements.

experience.title: Consultant Specialist (Delivery Lead / Scrum Master)
experience.company: HSBC Technology India Ltd., Pune & New York
experience.tech: Delivered multiple key programs over 13 years.
highlights: SSDML Integration (2020-2024): automated data transfers to 200+ downstream systems; reduced manual effort and data latency.
Global Platform Replacement (2017-2020): eliminated dual-entry and EUC inefficiencies; improved governance and data quality.
Reuters TOF Demise (2019-2020): Java adapter development; reduced third-party costs.
NORKOM Reconciliation (2016-2017): requirements gathering, data profiling... onsite delivery in New York.
Growth: progressed from developer to team lead; mentored 50+ professionals; delivered on time with quality.

education.degree: Master of Science in Project Management (in progress)
education.institution: UCD Smurfit Business School, Dublin, Ireland
education.coursework: Studying at Ireland's leading business school.

education.institution: G.H. Raisoni College of Engineering, Nagpur University, India

leadership.title: Creative and Entrepreneurial Careers Committee

leadership.summary: Member of the careers committee for the Global Leadership Program.

leadership.title: Project Management Institute (PMI Ireland) Student Club
leadership.summary: Active student member of the PMI Ireland chapter.

contact.summary: Experienced Senior IT Project Manager seeking new opportunities in the Banking/FinServ sector. Open to roles as a Project Manager, Delivery Lead, or IT Program Manager.
